skillTree.localised_description: This Lord belts out orders and can be heard even across a battlefield smothered in the grim noise of war.
The relentless drive and fury of the Hammer, harnessed for the protection of this ward’s bearer.
Karl Franz's Captain of Scouts is the very best in his field; a hunter truly without peer.
Markus Wulfhart seems to almost bend the air around him – arrows and blades just seem to glance off, if they even connect.
The dense, dark forest of Middenland is the most unforgiving, inhospitable of training grounds, and the place where Wulfhart perfected his survival skills.
As you might expect, the very best hunters make for elite ambushers and skirmishers.

effects.description:
Upkeep: -15% for Huntsmen and Archers units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +8 for Huntsmen units
	(Lord's army)

Missile strength: +10% for Huntsmen and Archers units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Blink and you'll probably be dead.

effects.description:
"Double Shot" ammunition (increased number of projectiles) for Huntsmen units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Deprive them of their eyes and they cannot shoot back.
Wulfhart is by far the most successful monster hunter and slayer anywhere in the Old World.

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit can deploy outside the deployment zone.
The unit is immune to psychological attacks (fear and terror).

skillTree.localised_description: There’s no need to rush when your target has little prospect of escape.

ui_effects.localised_text: Scaled projectile damage against combatants with missing health
Scaled projectile damage against combatants with missing health

skillTree.localised_description: Silent, swift and very, very deadly, this one can take down the foe from range without breaking a sweat or revealing his position.
Through the skin to kill the soul.
Only the foolish go on the hunt without supplies and a cast-iron plan.
Such advanced ballistic skills tend to rub off on one's subordinates.
Wulfhart considers it his sworn duty to dispatch the Emperor's enemies without the slightest hesitation.

ui_effects.localised_text: Scaled projectile damage against combatants with missing health

skillTree.localised_description: Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, it’s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.
Some creatures charge home with such fury that the very ground shakes beneath their feet.
Full-Plate armour protects the wearer from head-to-foot. Many such suits are blessed or imbued with arcane abilities.
The scars on this storied warrior reveal a veteran of many battles, a being not easy to kill and one worthy of respect and fear.
A deadly blade is especially lethal when in the hands of this master death-maker, killer and slaughterer!
This traditional trapper's tool is a noose made from wire; if the foe struggles, it simply tightens, cutting into the flesh.
Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.
This warrior is one with their blade; it is an extension of their will, making them a worthy foe in combat.
The iron will and indomitable presence of this leader ensures their followers remain steadfast when facing peril.
A blade that sings in defence will not let its wielder be penetrated.
Bears, Orcs, Kroxigor - prey-size is not a hindrance to the master hunter.
There are Lords that radiate power, confidence and fear, inspiring their followers to great or terrible acts.
“We march to war for our Emperor, and Sigmar, our saviour and lord.”

skillTree.localised_description: Those who know the land and its secrets will travel faster and further than the foes who don't.
This Lord expects utter obedience from the smallfolk, and has little time for insurrections or petty revolts.
Revered by the Warrior Priests, such a celebrated leader will inspire many new recruits.
The presence of this Lord ensures a measure of calm, reducing panic and desertion amongst followers.

effects.description:
Attrition: -3% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Lord's army)

Attrition: -8% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Lord's army)

Attrition: -15% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Through our acts, the gods will cleanse the lands.
It is said that Sigmar would bear a mortal wound and carry on fighting; this champion follows the hallowed Warrior-God.

effects.description:
Casualty replenishment rate: +30% for Lords
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: "The time to strike is now!"

effects.description: Enables lightning strike battles when reinforcements are present

skillTree.localised_description: A good quartermaster can ration equipment and foodstuffs efficiently, making supplies last longer.
Proficient with figures, this Lord, or his subordinates, can keep his army fulfilled, even in dire circumstances.
Countless conflicts and a keen sense of awareness have made this Lord difficult to entrap.

effects.description: Chance of intercepting an army using the Underway, beast-paths or Worldroots: +5%
Chance of intercepting an army using the Underway, beast-paths or Worldroots: +10%

skillTree.localised_description: "Ever thought about joining the Elector's troops, chief? You'd make a good soldier alright."

effects.description:
Recruit rank: +2 for all units
	(Lord's army)

attributes.bullet_text: This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can deploy outside the deployment zone.
The unit is immune to psychological attacks (fear and terror).
This unit can fire while on the move.
This unit can move hidden in any terrain.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Markus Wulfhart's advanced tracking and slaying skills have earned him both a reputation and the recognition of Karl Franz himself.

effects.description:
Upkeep: -50% for Archers and Huntsmen units
	(Lord's army)

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit can pass through trees.

ui_effects.localised_text: Scaled projectile damage against combatants with missing health

items.colour_text: Carved from Drakwald Oak and enchanted by a powerful Amber Wizard, its shots are guided directly into the hearts of Wulfhart's enemies.
